ygData.subject: Beserkers (was: Planes, here I come...)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... There was some talk on the Concert Hall board that while the increased speedup of Beserkers was not that impressive over Celerity, the song greatly
ygData.messageBody:
On Mon, 3 Jan 2000, Ronnie Roads wrote:
>
> > planes and dragons have taken me from level 55ish down to level 50 and less
> > than 2 bubbs. for songs i usually play mystic shielding (very few mobs use
> > fire/cold based spells that i've noticed) and verses of victory (celerity
> > and/or chant of battle before level 50) on normal pulls. i always keep
>
> Excellent info. I see you skipped McVaxius Berserker
> Crescendo. Does anyone even use that? I always just take
> the time to weave celerity and chant of battle. Love the
> dex for Ykesha 8).

There was some talk on the Concert Hall board that while the
increased speedup of Beserkers was not that impressive over
Celerity, the song greatly increased your chances of dual
wielding/double attacking. One fellow there said he used one
of those logfile parsers to check his average damage using
Beserkers vs Celerity/Chant, and it was much higher using
Beserkers even though Celerity/Chant gave better visible
modifiers. I'm still 5 bubbles away from that song so YMMV.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
